arts.ttl: Salford climb into League Two play-off places after victory over Morecambe
arts.sum: The midfielder came off the bench at half-time and made an immediate impact for the Ammies.

Salford's 3-0 win over Barrow on Boxing Day made it three successive wins without conceding a goal. They have now won seven of their last nine games. Morecambe's 1-0 win over Carlisle on Boxing Day w...

arts.ttl: Preview: Salford City vs. Morecambe - prediction, team news, lineups
arts.sum: Sports Mole previews Sunday's League Two clash between Salford City and Morecambe, including predictions, team news and possible lineups.
